SEARCH
Package HMS.Manager

Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.Manager.AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
Manages the loading, saving, and manipulation of appointments within the hospital management system.

    • isTimeSlotAvailable

      public static boolean isTimeSlotAvailable(String doctorID, LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Checks if a specific time slot is available for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      dateTime - The date and time of the appointment to check.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is available, false otherwise.
